text: A file, which can't be shown because your team is past the free storage limit, was commented on.
<@U7SL518D6> Thanks alot the links are so useful for me

*Curious*: has anyone setup a reverse proxy for a domain so that you could have <http://www.domain.com|www.domain.com> on one platform (wordpress or something else undesirable like that) and then <http://www.domain.com/blog|www.domain.com/blog> on HubSpot?
I’m trying to avoid using a separate <http://blog.domain.com|blog.domain.com> or similar subdomain… 
would love to steer clear of the subdomain debate and just see if anyone has found a way to accomplish this?
Thanks in advance :slightly_smiling_face:
I have a client whos internal IT team did such a thing. They used an amazon service to achieve it
